text: Gɨn borir kam ekevezɨma, an amebam a inigha atrivimɨn guivim bagha ghu. Ezɨ atrivimɨn guivim, otarir kam, mati an otozir borimɨn mɨrara ua bagha a gami. Egha a kamaghɨn uabɨ mɨgei, “Kɨ dɨpamɨn a isava azenim gatɨ. Kamaghɨn, kɨ ziam, Moses, a darɨgham.”2:10 Hibrun akamɨn, ziar kam, “Moses,” akar kamɨn mɨrara ghu, “A inigh pɨn anang.”
